content.question: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how MacNeice uses poetic elements and techniques to convey a complex understanding of the significance of Sunday morning.

frqParts.text: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how MacNeice uses poetic elements and techniques to convey a complex understanding of the significance of Sunday morning.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
